title: Legends.of.Persia.Update.v1.0.7-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:


                      Legends of Persia Update v1.0.7

    Release Date :  7/2014                         Protection : Steam
    Discs        :  1                              Genre      : RPG


   For list of changes read included patchnotes.txt


   - Extract
   - Run setup.exe and install update to your gamedir
   - Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
   - Play

   Notes: This patch requires: CODEX release of Legends of Persia
          Though update is named as 1.0.7 (by devs), version in the main
		  menu is still 1.0.5.

   Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
   online ..


                       CODEX is currently looking for:

                          nothing but competition!

                              are you ready?

       LNK^CPS                                                02/2014
